## Description {#details}

Struct to hold information about a partially invariant condition.

## Public Member Attributes

### ExitForPath {#a1485afe3cc5537d5747c6107db9df2d0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>BasicBlock&#42; llvm::IVConditionInfo::ExitForPath = nullptr</>}>
If the partially invariant path reaches a single exit block, ExitForPath is set to that block.

Otherwise it is nullptr.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/looputils-h/#l00570">570</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/looputils-h">LoopUtils.h</a>.

### PathIsNoop {#ae599fddb146a40b2cdb8f2bafdfe9652}
